com.korupt.logics

Class CardStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.korupt.logics.CardStore

  • public class CardStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the issued card details in a array and that card list is loaded from .dat/.txt file.And also stores all the card in that particular file when program terminates. * @author saurav.kumar
